biotools.summary: BioLegato is a generic graphical user interface (GUI), in essence, a program that runs other programs. Data are displayed and selected in a canvas. A program is chosen from dropdown menus, parameters are set in a pop up menu, and the program launched by issuing a shell command to the system. Thus, any program, from a simple shell script to a complex analytical pipeline, can be launched from BioLegato.
